addon.name: PSMC Super Mario Galaxy UI Sounds

extension.summary: GUI Sounds for the PSMC Super Mario Galaxy skin.
extension.description: These GUI Sounds were created for use with the PSMC's Super Mario Galaxy skin provided by The Papaw.
extension.news: [B][I][COLOR FFFFFF00]GUI Sounds for the PSMC's Super Mario Galaxy skin[/COLOR][/I][/B][COLOR FF00D5FF][CR]- License update[CR]- Initial release[/COLOR]
